compliant.section: 如有下述情形之一時，聯詠得揭露您的個人資料
compliant.legal provisions: The Personal Data Protection Act (PDPA) allows disclosure of personal data under certain circumstances, such as legal requirements or to protect rights.
The PDPA requires transparency regarding the use of cookies and the collection of personal data.
The PDPA mandates that individuals be informed of changes to privacy policies and have the opportunity to review them.
The PDPA requires organizations to provide contact information for inquiries regarding personal data.

non_compliant.legal provisions: The PDPA requires explicit consent for the use of cookies that collect personal data.
non_compliant.amend: Include a clear consent mechanism for cookie usage, informing users about the types of cookies used and their purposes.

non_compliant.legal provisions: The PDPA requires that users be notified of significant changes to the privacy policy in a timely manner.
non_compliant.amend: Implement a notification system to inform users of significant changes to the privacy policy, rather than stating changes can occur without notice.
